text: Miroir is a 1947 French film starring Jean Gabin about a businessman who moonlights as a gangster. It had admissions in France of 1 776 310. ==References== ==External links== *Miroir at IMDb Category:1947 films Category:French films Category:Films scored by Maurice Yvain Category:French drama films Category:1947 drama films Category:French black-and-white films
title: Miroir (film)
